channel.title: DClaws Special [Delta]
channel.description: Hi, I've recently been working on getting a special for Dragon Claws. I used Skittle's tutorial to edit it, but I cannot find the file. After reading further, I heard that method [b]lags[/b] the server. Does anyone have another method for adding a dragon claws special? I'll happily Rep++ someone if they can provide me with a working tutorial/answer to my question.

item.title: DClaws Special [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Apostrophes can be used to represent ownership of something. If you’re referring to more than one noun, the apostrophe is after the s. You’re right JC.
Anyways, you guys are going way off topic.

Read full topic

item.title: DClaws Special [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Apostrophes come after the ‘s’ when you are referring to more than one noun.

Read full topic

item.title: DClaws Special [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

no jc your not. i think apostrophes are used to take the place of some letters like don’t without the apostrophe would be do not. others wouldn’t need an apostrophe.

Read full topic

item.title: DClaws Special [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Unknown Supreme, post:10, topic:273117”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=360459.msg2747847#msg2747847 date=1239736739]

An Error Has Occurred!
Sorry, you don’t have enough reputation to modify other’s rep points - you need at least 15.

They made a grammar mistake. :S
It should be ‘Sorry, you don’t have enough reputation to modify others’ rep points - you need at least 15.’
[/quote]

Hehe, someone is not too good about their apostrophes.[/quote]
Am I wrong? :S

Read full topic

Too many people ask this question.

Ps. You can’t even rep people.
[/quote]
